question: 1.In an UP-counter, each flip-flop is triggered by:

answers.a: The output of the next flip-flop
answers.b: The normal output of the preceding flip-flop
answers.c: The clock pulse of the previous flip-flop
answers.d: The inverted output of the preceding flip-flop

question: 2.In digital logic, a counter is a device which

answers.b: Stores the number of times a particular event or process has occurred
answers.c: Stores the number of times a clock pulse rises and falls
